Antiquities of the city of Exeter collected by Richard Izacke ... Antiquities of the city of Exeter Izacke, Richard, 1624?-1698.
[8], 60 [i.e. 64], 191, [66] p., [1] p. of plates : ill., coats of arms, map.
Printed by E. Tyler and R. Holt, for Richard Marriott : Sold by George Marriott ..., London : 1677.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library. Published later under title: Remarkable antiquities of the city of Exeter. Index: p. [1]-[46]
